title: Top Republican suggests changing Senate rules to begin Trump impeachment trial within days
description: The idea, while unlikely, highlights the pressure Trump allies feel to begin the trial as Pelosi continues to withhold the charges of abuse of power and obstruction of Congress.

The suggestion, while unlikely due to the high threshold of votes required for changing Senate impeachment rules, underscores the pressure some Trump allies feel as the president stews over the impeachment delay.
